name: Potion Madness
description:
Potion Madness, made for DJAM #5

Made By: Chris Fang (AntiChange) and Maximo van der Raadt (InlandTaipan)

 Our first attempt at a Unity game

Laser Sound from Zapsplat.com and OST by Chris Fang

All other sound effects from Brackey's 2D Megapack

Pixel art by Chris Fang and Maximo van der Raadt
